replies.msg:
concept易明 但題目可以出到好難
用two sided limit證個普通function嘅continuity梗係唔難 但個function分開rational同irrational揾continuity points就好撚難 又要用epsilon delta又要用density
啲function加個ceiling/floor/absolute value都已經難搞啦
好似taylor series揾頭幾個term算易 但證convergence個remainder又lagrange form又cauchy form又integral form 對year1嚟講真係難
integration又可以整到upper同lower limit都係functions
講到尾都係睇出題嗰個有冇心玩嘢
